data.title: can't wait to return!
data.text:
Absolutely charming!
creative and delicious choices................wonderful surroundings.....................free wifi (the password is on the wall).
Lots of folks were enjoyed the food and atmosphere when we visited.  There was even a mah jong game going on (they didn't need a fifth -- I asked).
street parking

data.title: Keepsake Cute Cakes!
data.text:
We sampled cupcakes offered during one evening at Cruising Grand Escondido and were given a BOGO card.  They were tasty so we took advantage of the offer.  

Loved the inside of this store. Lots of examples of their cakes are displayed inside and in the windows. The display cases are filled will all sorts of bakery specialty items.  A top-drawer establishment

Our BOGO choices were the Snickers cupcake and the Pistachio cupcake - both delicious.  

Happy they are on Grand Avenue!

data.title: Fresh Pastries and Great Coffee
data.text: We wanted a quick bite before heading off exploring and just stumbled upon this cute café.  There were a variety of treats and breakfast foods to choose from so it was nice it wasn't just cupcakes.  The place reminded me of another café back home so it was relaxing and comfortable.  Books are available for anyone to read and board/table games for adults and kids.  Another great place in Escondido...With charm and character (sometimes you just want a break from corporate coffee shops)

data.title: New location and great selection
data.text: Thin Mint cupcake?! yes. This new spacious location is ideal. They have special rooms for wedding vendors and for tasting. Lots of seating to stop by and treat yourself.

data.title: Breakfast
data.text:
At breakfast at Cute Cakes last Saturday AM.  It was not crowded when we walked in.  We soon discovered that this place is primarily a bakery, but they also offer a breakfast menu of pastries, biscuits and muffins.  I had the cinnamon french toast, served with syrup.  Very sweet and tasty, but sliced very thinly.  My gf had a ham, egg and cheese croissant, which she said was good, but she said it tasted like it was heated in a microwave.   

We stopped on the way out and bought a couple cupcakes and s piece of apple strudel.  We enjoyed the cupcakes later in the day, and i really enjoyed the apple strudel as a sweet and tasty late night snack.

data.title: Fresh and tasty desserts
data.text: Cupcakes is a great place to stop for dessert, breakfast or a light lunch.  Everything is fresh and delicious.  They have different flavored cupcakes as well as muffins, croissants and other treats.  In addition you can buy lovely themed gifts.  My favorite thing about the place is the comfortable and welcoming décorand friendly staff.  Several friends and I spend hours there playing Mah Jongg occasionally and just enjoy our time there.  The staff are always helpful and welcoming.  OH, in addition they make the most amazing cakes for weddings and other special occasions.   Stop by you won't regret it.

data.title: JUST GET INSIDE!!!
data.text: I swear to the food and sweet gods that if you just get through the door you will be completely happy. I called the decorations "Industrial Boho". The servers are AWESOME. Prices are average to high. The food was great. JUST GET IN THERE and you will see what you have been missing.

data.title: "Let them eat cake!"
data.text:
Wonderful little cake boutique located at the end of Grand Ave. 
We tried the pumpkin cupcake which was simple, light, and flavorful. 
Getting married? We highly suggest checking out this place. 
They have a separate area dedicated for different vendors to show ideas for your wedding. 
Service was so delightful.

data.title: Sweets for the Sweet!
data.text: Scrumptious cupcakes! I really need to stop going to this place! On Mondays you get one free cupcake for every two you buy. Specialty cakes, wedding cakes, breakfast and lunch options too. Everything is made on site. So glad to have this wonderful bakery in downtown Escondido!

data.title: Great Place to Relax, read, and have small lunch and cakes!!!
data.text: Just opened in 7/3/15 this large bakery and lunch  counter serves small lunch items, and great bakery treats with coffee and teas. Very relaxing bake shop with inside and outside dining.
